In an otherwise charming feature story posted on MLB.com about the charity work that he and his wife do for stray dogs, Mark Buehrle 's comments noticeably changed in tone when Michael Vick 's name came up. Even if you are not a dog lover, how can you sit there and make two dogs fight and one is going to die? said( Mark Buehrle ).`` How could you do that if you are somewhat sane? a significant step back to superstardom: His first endorsement deal since his return to the NFL in 2009. The deal is with Unequal Technologies, a company that makes football pads Michael Vick used this season.
